css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-d0227f23-u{min-width:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,29,48,53),1);padding-top:150px;padding-bottom:150px;flex-direction:column;row-gap:66px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-d0227f23-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,57,79,138),1);display:block;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-d0227f23-u{padding-top:200px;padding-bottom:200px;row-gap:94px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-d0227f23-u{row-gap:50px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-d0227f23-u{row-gap:30px;}}
